snippet: An indictment unsealed by the International Criminal Court accuses Charles Blé Goudé, a crucial ally of the Ivory Coast strongman Laurent Gbagbo, of crimes against humanity.
lead_paragraph: An indictment unsealed by the International Criminal Court accuses Charles Blé Goudé, a crucial ally of the Ivory Coast strongman Laurent Gbagbo, of crimes against humanity.

headline.main: Ally of Ivory Coast Strongman Sought by International Court

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
